\newcolumntype{P}[1]{>{\centering\arraybackslash}p{#1}}


\newcommand{\bccSep}[1]
{
\begin{center}
\section{#1}
\end{center}
}




\newcommand{\bccTitle}[1]
{
\subsection{#1}
}


\newcommand{\bccBox}[2]
{
\subsubsection{#1}

#2
}
